attributes.action: Make school not give children homework on weekends or holidays
attributes.additional_details: Because kids are stressing about homework and there need to relax
attributes.background: Make school not give children  homework during weekends or holidays because there need to relax and be stress free

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about when to set homework and when this is due are a matter for individual teachers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Abolish homework across all schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603551
